query: SELECT s.id as subjectId, s.name, COUNT(q.id) as questionCount FROM subjects s LEFT JOIN questions q ON s.id = q.subjectId AND q.isDemo = 1 WHERE s.isDemo = 1 GROUP BY s.id;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2yp3nD2VtcmPj65.root --database Zt6E6wVVzDENrVcXUKGBHG --execute SELECT s.id as subjectId, s.name, COUNT(q.id) as questionCount FROM subjects s LEFT JOIN questions q ON s.id = q.subjectId AND q.isDemo = 1 WHERE s.isDemo = 1 GROUP BY s.id;
